modName: Detailed Tree LOD for Realistic Aspens
summary: This is a compatibility patch that provides the excellent Tree LOD from Detailed Terrain and Tree LOD for the Realistic Aspen Trees mod.
descriptionHtml:
I enjoy both Detailed Terrain and Tree LOD for its most excellent distance terrain enhancement (especially those delightful little tufts of grass in the forest), but I also enjoy Realistic Aspen Trees... which gets rid of the Tree LOD's with their grass tufts.

This is a very basic compatibility patch so that you get the details from the Detailed Terrain and Tree LOD mod, and have multicoloured aspens in the distance as per Realistic Aspens.

Install the following:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17984/?]Detailed Terrain and Tree LOD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51069/?]Realistic Aspen Trees[/url]

Then overwrite with this file.

[size=2][b]Other Mods by me:[/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52436/?]Mine Foreman Sell Ore[/url]
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51566/?]Servants in Livery: Stewards Uniforms
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52878/?]Cultural Armors - The Khajiit[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51886/?]USKP Patch for TK Children[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51860/?]Freckle Face for TK Children[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52671/?]Detailed TreeLOD for Realistic Aspens
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58622/?]Hi Res East Empire Trading Company Sign[/url]
author: Kidhedera
